title: Valance, 18th century
medium:
Mordant painted and dyed and hand-painted cotton(chintz)
Medium: cotton 
Technique: hand-painted; mordant and resist dyed; plain weave foundation
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 50 x 83 cm (19 11/16 x 32 11/16 in.)
description: Scalloped valence with one seam (two pieces sewn together). Chintz fabric features pineapples and exotic botanicals in brown, purple, greens, yellow, pink and red on a white ground.

exhibitions.title: Nancy and Edwin Marks Collection Gallery: Treasures from the Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Valance, 18th century.
18th century. Mordant painted and dyed and hand-painted cotton(chintz)
Medium: cotton 
Technique: hand-painted; mordant and resist dyed; plain weave foundation. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-61.
